values:
Pastor Jeffery talks with his wife Nicole about emotional resilience, with a particular focus on what this means for ladies. They discuss antifragility; education and homeschooling; practicalities steps towards increased resilience; impromptu hospitality; the impact of contemporary culture; the ever-expanding idea of “trauma”; Biblical role models; the wife as her husband’s helper; the importance of an understanding […]

The post Emotional Resilience | Nicole Jeffery appeared first on .
